title: Bug splat report every day i log in
body:
Hello, 
I get a bug splat notification everytime i log into League of Legends Client, however this report doesn't seem to have any impact on the game in general, just a couple little glitches with the rune pages or something. Since i don't really want to verify game files, force re-update or reinstall the game every time, is there a way i can fix this? 
Regards
Catspeare

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

With any luck , that will be enough to solve your issue for good. Failing that, the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) are your next best resources.

Hey Catspeare,

It seems like it may be an issue with your client I get you may not want a re-install or what not However riot have an amazing tool called The Hextech Repair tool which can automatically repair your client. 

Download link - > https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

follow the instructions and hopefully you can fix this issue :)

Cheers,
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
Therzair
